content: Certainly! The martial arts style predominantly used in the fight scenes of Cobra Kai is a variation of Karate called "Miyagi-Do Karate" and "Cobra Kai Karate". The show's creators and fight choreographers have taken inspiration from various styles of karate, including Shotokan, Goju-ryu, and Okinawan karate, to create unique and visually impressive fight scenes. The actors also undergo extensive training in martial arts to perform the fight scenes convincingly.
